sources.title: Auschwitz1946
sources.description: This document were used for the war crime tribunal in Nürnberg 1945-46 to show the atrocities in the Auschwitz complex All footage were taken some month after liberation. After liberation the camp was cleaned up for those inmates who still lived there. This film document has no audio track due the fact that the Nürnberg trials were international ... no original script to this film are known to exist
